Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Clark
ShortDescription: 72 North buses will terminate at North Avenue/Clark due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North Avenue buses will terminate at North Avenue/Clark due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd Strret Beach
ShortDescription: #63 63rd buses will terminate at Stony Island due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#63 63rd buses will terminate at Stony Island due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Trains bypassing Belmont through Fullerton Stations
ShortDescription: NB Brown Line trains running but not stopping at Belmont. SB Brown Line trains running, but not stopping at Belmont, Wellington, Diverse, Fullerton stations.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound Brown Line trains are running but not stopping at Belmont.

Southbound Brown Line trains are running, but not stopping at Belmont, Wellington, Diversey & Fullerton stations by CPD request.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing Roosevelt to Wilson Stations
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping between Wilson to Roosevelt stations, in both directions, per CPD request.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping between Wilson to Roosevelt stations, in both directions, per CPD request.

95th-bound Red Line trains are running but not stopping at Sheridan, Addison, Belmont, Fullerton, North/Clybourn, Clark/Division, Grand, Lake, Monroe, Jackson and Harrison stations.

Howard-bound trains are running but not stopping at Belmont, Addison and Sheridan stations.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
